official_title: Designing a Virtual Reality Intervention to Improve Physical and Psychological Health in Intensive Care Units
inclusion_criteria:
* Adult
* English speaking
* 3+ days ICU admission with limited mobility
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Pregnancy
* Blind/severe visual impairment
* History of seizures
* Intubation/sedation
* Special enteric contact isolation
